comment: Emma Thompson: FTX.US needs to improve their withdrawal process and platform stability. Not recommended.
Christopher Rodriguez: I've been using FTX.US for over a year and have been very pleased with their service. The trading platform is reliable and customer support is excellent.
Olivia Garcia: My experience with FTX.US has been excellent. Their platform is user-friendly and their fees are competitive.
Sophia Lee: FTX.US has consistently provided a top-notch trading experience. Fast executions and great customer service.
Matthew Wilson: FTX.US gets the job done, but there are some areas where they could improve, particularly with their mobile app.
